name: Kekwcoin
description: Kekwcoin is an SPL deflationary token that runs the KEKW community and decentralized ecosystem. $KEKW is conceived not only as a community owned tradable token but also as a rewarding mechanism to content creators and participants of the community. The KEKW ecosystem aims to empower emergent creators and help them expose their content in KEKW's NFT Marketplace, and provide as well DeFi tools linked to $KEKW. As a social driven community, the KEKW platform also hosts numerous events weekly to support and promote its creators and community collaborators, awarding true participants that add value to the community with $KEKW.
